if.test: kw_date_from != null and kw_date_to != null and kw_date_from != '' and kw_date_to != ''

sql.if: regdate BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{kw_date_from},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{kw_date_to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+0.99999 AND

mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, adminmemo = #{adminMemo} WHERE userid = #{userid}
